about_the_game:
Awaken your inner Elite Vanguard and transform into an unstoppable force on the battlefield. Accomplish any mission armed with cutting-edge gear, unmatched expertise, flawless precision, and unparalleled finesse. Are you prepared to storm into action and take control of the battlefield?

This pack includes:


  • Doorkicker (Armored Breacher) Uniform
  • Pointman Helmet (Spearhead)
  • The Ripper (Phantom Black) Mask
  • Mule Pack (Dead Drop)
  • Strike Gloves (Jaw Breaker)
  • 5x FG 42 + 100x ammo (7.92×57mm Mauser)
  • 5x Taiga 21 + 100x ammo (Combat Shell)
  • 5x The John
  • 10x Portable Signals Detector
  • 10x M67 Frag Grenade
  • 10x M84 Flash Grenade
  • 3x Double XP Ticket
  • 5x Insurance Ticket
  • 200x Crowns

This pack may only be purchased once per account and is available for a limited time.

Awaken your inner Elite Vanguard and transform into an unstoppable force on the battlefield. Accomplish any mission armed with cutting-edge gear, unmatched expertise, flawless precision, and unparalleled finesse. Are you prepared to storm into action and take control of the battlefield?

This pack includes:

This pack may only be purchased once per account and is available for a limited time.

pc_requirements.minimum:

short_description: Awaken your inner Elite Vanguard and transform into an unstoppable force on the battlefield. Accomplish any mission armed with cutting-edge gear, unmatched expertise, flawless precision, and unparalleled finesse. Are you prepared to storm into action and take control of the battlefield?

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
